chunks.zh: 大家认知的现在的智驾是什么水平？
chunks.en: What level of intelligent driving is currently recognized by everyone?

chunks.zh: 还有现在的新车带智驾是不是算基本配置，我有天跟朋友讨论了这个事情，我个人感觉还远没有到普及的程度，朋友说我不了解认知偏差，感觉大部分人没有开上带智驾的车，也不了解智驾能做到什么
chunks.en: Are intelligent driving systems considered a basic configuration in new cars nowadays? I was discussing this with a friend the other day, and I personally feel that they are far from being widespread. My friend said I don't understand cognitive bias, and that most people haven't driven a car with intelligent driving and don't understand what intelligent driving can do.

chunks.zh: 辅助驾驶愣是被吹成了智驾, 遥遥领先
chunks.en: Assisted driving is being touted as intelligent driving, far ahead of the competition.

chunks.zh: 反正上周在我家地库，看到一个自动泊车没泊进去的小鹏，车内没人，我打电话通知车主，跟他说，他的车挡住路了，他还不可置信的说，怎么可能，我车明明停在车位了。
chunks.en: Anyway, last week in my garage, I saw a Xiaopeng car that failed to park automatically. There was no one in the car. I called the owner and told him that his car was blocking the road. He said in disbelief, how is that possible? My car is clearly parked in the parking space.

chunks.zh: 反正我觉得啥时候智驾出事故后厂商负责处理事故责任的时候，我觉得可以考虑。
chunks.en: Anyway, I think I'll consider it when manufacturers are responsible for handling accident liability after an intelligent driving accident.

chunks.zh: @dhb233 #20 重新定义 L4
chunks.en: @dhb233 #20 Redefining L4

chunks.zh: 爱国专用
chunks.en: For patriotic use only.

chunks.zh: 坐过带智驾的顺风车，高速和快速路开个定速巡航，打个转向灯就能变道
chunks.en: I've taken a rideshare with intelligent driving. On the highway and expressway, you can turn on cruise control and change lanes by flicking the turn signal.

chunks.zh: 另外试驾过问界 M7 ，语音直接选个终点，自个儿就过去了，走高驾和自动变道超车都很稳。
chunks.en: I also test drove the AITO M7. I selected a destination directly by voice, and it went there by itself. High-speed driving and automatic lane changes and overtaking were very stable.

chunks.zh: 自动泊车和代客泊车很流畅，透明影像连车底什么东西都看得一清二楚。
chunks.en: Automatic parking and valet parking are very smooth, and the transparent image shows everything under the car very clearly.

chunks.zh: 网上吵那么多，不如试驾一次。
chunks.en: Instead of arguing so much online, it's better to take a test drive.

chunks.zh: 但高配车型限制和智驾包把我劝退了
chunks.en: But the high-end model restrictions and intelligent driving packages deterred me.

chunks.zh: 单纯讨厌某大嘴，导致现在也讨厌某为
chunks.en: Simply hate a certain big mouth, which leads to hating a certain company now.

chunks.zh: 评论区里面的小白鼠挺多的 佩服
chunks.en: There are quite a few guinea pigs in the comments. I admire them.

chunks.zh: 能处理高速就行了城市还是自己开吧
chunks.en: It's enough if it can handle highways. I'd rather drive myself in the city.

chunks.zh: 人车共驾。
chunks.en: Human-machine co-driving.

chunks.zh: 比如人驾有 5%可能性犯错，打开智驾后因为放松警惕，人犯错可能性增加到 10%，智驾有 35%可能性犯错，那么有人监督的智驾可能就是 3.5%的犯错机会，还是比单纯人驾要好。
chunks.en: For example, if there is a 5% chance of human driving error, and the chance of human error increases to 10% after turning on intelligent driving due to relaxation, and intelligent driving has a 35% chance of error, then intelligent driving with human supervision may have a 3.5% chance of error, which is still better than purely human driving.

chunks.zh: 数字我瞎拍的，应该是不对的，就是表达个意思。
chunks.en: The numbers I made up, they're probably wrong, just expressing a meaning.

chunks.zh: 只要厂商敢完全承担法律责任，那么智驾就成熟了，目前城市路段开智驾感觉别自己开还累。
chunks.en: Intelligent driving will only be mature when manufacturers dare to take full legal responsibility. Currently, driving with intelligent driving in urban areas feels more tiring than driving myself.

chunks.zh: 没出事都是你好我好大家好，智驾牛逼
chunks.en: If nothing goes wrong, everything is fine, intelligent driving is awesome.

chunks.zh: 出事就是智能驾驶属于辅助驾驶，驾驶员全责
chunks.en: If something goes wrong, intelligent driving is just assisted driving, and the driver is fully responsible.

chunks.zh: 什么时候保险公司能全保智能驾驶就是它完全成熟了，因为水军会说谎，但精算师不会
chunks.en: When the insurance company can fully insure intelligent driving, then it is completely mature, because trolls will lie, but actuaries won't.

chunks.zh: 我在高速上看到最左车道的新能源车，都会试着开上去，慢慢减速。。。特别好玩儿
chunks.en: When I see a new energy vehicle in the leftmost lane on the highway, I try to drive up to it and slowly decelerate... It's especially fun.

chunks.zh: 关于智驾有一点很神奇，没有任一厂商通过具体数据秀肌肉。
chunks.en: One thing about intelligent driving is very strange: no manufacturer has shown off with specific data.

chunks.zh: 以前的 waymo 和 apollo 做“自动驾驶”的时候通常会公布里程数据，接管次数之类的数据证明智驾的可靠程度。
chunks.en: When Waymo and Apollo were doing 'automatic driving' in the past, they would usually publish mileage data, intervention times, and other data to prove the reliability of intelligent driving.

chunks.zh: 现在的“智能驾驶”厂商经常创造一堆高大上的名词，听起来很厉害，但是具体厉害在哪里又无法量化，用户使用智驾出车祸以后运气好一点定性为使用不当，一秒前退出，还能去维权，运气不好连维权的机会都没有了。
chunks.en: The current 'intelligent driving' manufacturers often create a bunch of grand-sounding terms that sound impressive, but it's impossible to quantify exactly where they are so impressive. If a user has an accident using intelligent driving, and is lucky, it will be defined as improper use, and they withdrew a second before, they can still defend their rights, but if they're not lucky, they won't even have the opportunity to defend their rights.

chunks.zh: @langhuishan 让交警无法选中
chunks.en: @langhuishan Makes it impossible for traffic police to select.

chunks.zh: 城市道路/停车 自己来，高速累了就 AUTOPILOT 。
chunks.en: City roads/parking - do it yourself. Use AUTOPILOT when tired on the highway.

chunks.zh: 我认为华为智驾遥遥领先
chunks.en: I think Huawei's intelligent driving is far ahead.

chunks.zh: @zhangxiaoaiw  这心太大了吧，起码应该看着车在车位停好
chunks.en: @zhangxiaoaiw That's too careless, you should at least watch the car park properly in the parking space.

chunks.zh: @skyrim61
chunks.en: @skyrim61

chunks.zh: 大家在坐的都是 L2 ，只有量变没有质变
chunks.en: Everyone here is at L2, there is only quantitative change, no qualitative change.

chunks.zh: 去头部的车试驾一圈就知道了
chunks.en: Take a test drive of the leading cars and you'll know.
